officialTitle: The Effects of Empagliflozin on Functional and Structural Arterial Wall Characteristics
inclusionCriteria:
* diabetes mellitus type 1
* Must have minimum age of 30 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* diagnosed advanced heart, kidney or liver failure
* benign prostatic hyperplasia
* prostatic carcinoma
* frequent urinary tract infections
* non-type 1 diabetes mellitus
